verses.verse: Ἐν <WG1722> En In ( The Choosing of the Seven) δὲ <WG1161> de - ταῖς <WG3588> tais - ἡμέραις <WG2250> hēmerais days [when] ταύταις <WG3778> tautais those πληθυνόντων <WG4129> plēthynontōn were increasing in number , τῶν <WG3588> tōn the μαθητῶν <WG3101> mathētōn disciples ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto began γογγυσμὸς <WG1112> gongysmos to grumble τῶν <WG3588> tōn the Ἑλληνιστῶν <WG1675> Hellēnistōn Grecian [Jews among them] πρὸς <WG4314> pros against τοὺς <WG3588> tous the Ἑβραίους <WG1445> Hebraious Hebraic [Jews] ( Literally the Hellenists began to grumble against the Hebrews) ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because παρεθεωροῦντο <WG3865> paretheōrounto were being overlooked ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the διακονίᾳ <WG1248> diakonia distribution [ of food ] . τῇ <WG3588> tē - καθημερινῇ <WG2522> kathēmerinē daily αἱ <WG3588> hai - χῆραι <WG5503> chērai widows αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their

Προσκαλεσάμενοι <WG4341> Proskalesamenoi summoned δὲ <WG1161> de So οἱ <WG3588> hoi the δώδεκα <WG1427> dōdeka Twelve τὸ <WG3588> to - πλῆθος <WG4128> plēthos all τῶν <WG3588> tōn the μαθητῶν <WG3101> mathētōn disciples εἶπαν <WG2036> eipan [and] said , Οὐκ <WG3756> Ouk vvv ἀρεστόν <WG701> areston unacceptable ἐστιν <WG1510> estin “ It is ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas [for] us καταλείψαντας <WG2641> kataleipsantas to neglect τὸν <WG3588> ton the λόγον <WG3056> logon word τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God διακονεῖν <WG1247> diakonein [in order] to wait on τραπέζαις <WG5132> trapezais tables .

ἐπισκέψασθε <WG1980> episkepsasthe select δέ <WG1161> de Therefore , ἀδελφοί <WG80> adelphoi brothers , ἄνδρας <WG435> andras men ἐξ <WG1537> ex from ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn among you μαρτυρουμένους <WG3140> martyroumenous confirmed to be ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven πλήρεις <WG4134> plēreis full Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos of [the] Spirit καὶ <WG2532> kai and σοφίας <WG4678> sophias wisdom . οὓς <WG3739> hous [to them] καταστήσομεν <WG2525> katastēsomen We will appoint ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi - τῆς <WG3588> tēs - χρείας <WG5532> chreias responsibility ταύτης <WG3778> tautēs this

ἡμεῖς <WG1473> hēmeis - δὲ <WG1161> de and τῇ <WG3588> tē to προσευχῇ <WG4335> proseuchē prayer καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῇ <WG3588> tē to the διακονίᾳ <WG1248> diakonia ministry τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the λόγου <WG3056> logou word . ” προσκαρτερήσομεν <WG4342> proskarterēsomen will devote ourselves

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἤρεσεν <WG700> ēresen pleased ὁ <WG3588> ho [This] λόγος <WG3056> logos proposal ἐνώπιον <WG1799> enōpion . . . παντὸς <WG3956> pantos whole τοῦ <WG3588> tou the πλήθους <WG4128> plēthous group . καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐξελέξαντο <WG1586> exelexanto They chose Στέφανον <WG4736> Stephanon Stephen , ἄνδρα <WG435> andra a man πλήρης* <WG4134> plērēs full πίστεως <WG4102> pisteōs of faith καὶ <WG2532> kai and Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit , Ἁγίου <WG40> Hagiou [of the] Holy καὶ <WG2532> kai as well as Φίλιππον <WG5376> Philippon Philip , καὶ <WG2532> kai - Πρόχορον <WG4402> Prochoron Prochorus , καὶ <WG2532> kai - Νικάνορα <WG3527> Nikanora Nicanor , καὶ <WG2532> kai - Τίμωνα <WG5096> Timōna Timon , καὶ <WG2532> kai - Παρμενᾶν <WG3937> Parmenan Parmenas , καὶ <WG2532> kai and Νικόλαον <WG3532> Nikolaon Nicolas προσήλυτον <WG4339> prosēlyton a convert [to Judaism] . ( Literally and Nicolas, a convert of Antioch,) Ἀντιοχέα <WG491> Antiochea from Antioch ,

οὓς <WG3739> hous [these seven] ἔστησαν <WG2476> estēsan They presented ἐνώπιον <WG1799> enōpion to τῶν <WG3588> tōn the ἀποστόλων <WG652> apostolōn apostles , ( Literally —whom they set before the apostles,) καὶ <WG2532> kai [who] προσευξάμενοι <WG4336> proseuxamenoi prayed ἐπέθηκαν <WG2007> epethēkan [and] laid αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois on them . τὰς <WG3588> tas [their] χεῖρας <WG5495> cheiras hands

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai [So] ὁ <WG3588> ho the λόγος <WG3056> logos word τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God ηὔξανεν <WG837> ēuxanen continued to spread . καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐπληθύνετο <WG4129> eplēthyneto grew ὁ <WG3588> ho The ἀριθμὸς <WG706> arithmos number τῶν <WG3588> tōn of μαθητῶν <WG3101> mathētōn disciples ἐν <WG1722> en in Ἰερουσαλὴμ <WG2419> Ierousalēm Jerusalem σφόδρα <WG4970> sphodra rapidly , πολύς <WG4183> polys a great τε <WG5037> te and ὄχλος <WG3793> ochlos number τῶν <WG3588> tōn of ἱερέων <WG2409> hiereōn priests ὑπήκουον <WG5219> hypēkouon became obedient τῇ <WG3588> tē to the πίστει <WG4102> pistei faith .

Στέφανος <WG4736> Stephanos Stephen , ( The Arrest of Stephen) δὲ <WG1161> de Now πλήρης <WG4134> plērēs [who was] full χάριτος <WG5485> charitos of grace καὶ <WG2532> kai and δυνάμεως <WG1411> dynameōs power , ἐποίει <WG4160> epoiei was performing τέρατα <WG5059> terata wonders καὶ <WG2532> kai and σημεῖα <WG4592> sēmeia signs μεγάλα <WG3173> megala great ἐν <WG1722> en among τῷ <WG3588> tō the λαῷ <WG2992> laō people .

ἀνέστησαν <WG450> anestēsan resistance arose δέ <WG1161> de But τινες <WG5100> tines - τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τῆς <WG3588> tēs what συναγωγῆς <WG4864> synagōgēs [the] Synagogue τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the λεγομένης <WG3004> legomenēs was called Λιβερτίνων <WG3032> Libertinōn Freedmen , καὶ <WG2532> kai including Κυρηναίων <WG2956> Kyrēnaiōn Cyrenians , καὶ <WG2532> kai - Ἀλεξανδρέων <WG221> Alexandreōn Alexandrians , καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῶν <WG3588> tōn men ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from Κιλικίας <WG2791> Kilikias [the provinces of] Cilicia καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ἀσίας <WG773> Asias Asia . ( Literally and those from Cilicia and Asia; the Roman Province of Asia was located in what is now western Turkey.) συζητοῦντες <WG4802> syzētountes They began to argue τῷ <WG3588> tō with Στεφάνῳ <WG4736> Stephanō Stephen ,

καὶ <WG2532> kai [but] οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἴσχυον <WG2480> ischyon they could not ἀντιστῆναι <WG436> antistēnai stand up to τῇ <WG3588> tē [his] σοφίᾳ <WG4678> sophia wisdom καὶ <WG2532> kai [or] τῷ <WG3588> tō the Πνεύματι <WG4151> Pneumati Spirit ᾧ <WG3739> hō by whom ἐλάλει <WG2980> elalei he spoke .

Τότε <WG5119> Tote Then ὑπέβαλον <WG5260> hypebalon they prompted ἄνδρας <WG435> andras [some] men λέγοντας <WG3004> legontas to say ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - , Ἀκηκόαμεν <WG191> Akēkoamen “ We heard αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [Stephen] λαλοῦντος <WG2980> lalountos speak ῥήματα <WG4487> rhēmata words βλάσφημα <WG989> blasphēma of blasphemy εἰς <WG1519> eis against Μωϋσῆν <WG3475> Mōusēn Moses καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεόν <WG2316> Theon [against] God . ”

συνεκίνησάν <WG4787> synekinēsan they stirred up τε <WG5037> te [So] τὸν <WG3588> ton the λαὸν <WG2992> laon people , καὶ <WG2532> kai - τοὺς <WG3588> tous - πρεσβυτέρους <WG4245> presbyterous elders , καὶ <WG2532> kai and τοὺς <WG3588> tous - γραμματεῖς <WG1122> grammateis scribes καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπιστάντες <WG2186> epistantes confronted [Stephen] . συνήρπασαν <WG4884> synērpasan They seized αὐτὸν <WG846> auton him καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἤγαγον <WG71> ēgagon brought [him] εἰς <WG1519> eis before τὸ <WG3588> to the συνέδριον <WG4892> synedrion Sanhedrin , ( Or the Council; also in verse 15)

Ἔστησάν <WG2476> Estēsan they presented τε <WG5037> te [where] μάρτυρας <WG3144> martyras witnesses ψευδεῖς <WG5571> pseudeis false λέγοντας <WG3004> legontas [who] said , Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos man οὗτος <WG3778> houtos “ This οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv παύεται <WG3973> pauetai never stops λαλῶν <WG2980> lalōn speaking ῥήματα <WG4487> rhēmata . . . κατὰ <WG2596> kata against τοῦ <WG3588> tou - τόπου <WG5117> topou place τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ἁγίου <WG40> hagiou holy [τούτου] <WG3778> toutou this καὶ <WG2532> kai and τοῦ <WG3588> tou [against] the νόμου <WG3551> nomou law .

ἀκηκόαμεν <WG191> akēkoamen we have heard γὰρ <WG1063> gar For αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou him λέγοντος <WG3004> legontos say ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus ὁ <WG3588> ho of Ναζωραῖος <WG3480> Nazōraios Nazareth οὗτος <WG3778> houtos - καταλύσει <WG2647> katalysei will destroy τὸν <WG3588> ton - τόπον <WG5117> topon place τοῦτον <WG3778> touton this καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀλλάξει <WG236> allaxei change τὰ <WG3588> ta the ἔθη <WG1485> ethē customs ἃ <WG3739> ha that παρέδωκεν <WG3860> paredōken handed down ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin to us . ” Μωϋσῆς <WG3475> Mōusēs Moses

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἀτενίσαντες <WG816> atenisantes looked intently εἰς <WG1519> eis at αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Stephen] , πάντες <WG3956> pantes All οἱ <WG3588> hoi who καθεζόμενοι <WG2516> kathezomenoi were sitting ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the συνεδρίῳ <WG4892> synedriō Sanhedrin εἶδον <WG3708> eidon [and] they saw that τὸ <WG3588> to - πρόσωπον <WG4383> prosōpon face αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his ὡσεὶ <WG5616> hōsei [was] like πρόσωπον <WG4383> prosōpon [the] face ἀγγέλου <WG32> angelou of an angel .
